fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Steal the abilities of a random role in the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each day, a random non-Mafia role in the game will be randomly selected. You will be informed which role this is at the beginning of the night.
- You will gain any passives this role has, and you may perform its night ability/abilities. If you perform the role's night ability/abilities, the player with that role will be roleblocked through immunities.
- You may not steal from any roles that have a day ability that enables the usage of the night ability (e.g. Jailor's jail, Pirate's duel, Less Annoying Grandmaster In My Recommended Section's duel)
